Summary: second time bright light appeared in sky for hours... still there
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around January 7th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsThe first time was on Christmas. I was making a joke with GF saying it must be the star of Bethlehem. hasnt been back until about 3:14 this morning, and still there now at 6:00. thought it was satellite at first but far too close, and definitely not a helicopter. sits in the east southeastern sky. looked up event on google sky, and the nearest anomoly is Vega.... this is DEFINITELY not Vega
